etymology.description: 宋 + 庆(慶) + 龄(齡) = surname + given name (Song Qingling).
etymology.interpretation: Full name of a prominent Chinese revolutionary and stateswoman, also known as Madame Sun Yat-sen. Combines the surname 宋 with the given name 庆龄/慶齡.
etymology.simplification: Given name characters were simplified: 慶 → 庆 (component reduction) and 齡 → 龄 (齒 → 齿 plus stroke streamlining); 宋 unchanged.

parts.english: surname Song; the Song dynasty; ancient state of Song; Song-style (typeface)
to celebrate; celebration; to congratulate; auspicious
age; years of age; lifespan; service length

examples.chinese: 宋庆龄是中国近现代史上的重要人物(宋慶齡是中國近現代史上的重要人物)。
examples.pinyin: Sòng Qìnglíng shì Zhōngguó jìn xiàndài shǐ shàng de zhòngyào rénwù.
examples.english: Song Qingling is an important figure in modern Chinese history.

examples.chinese: 人们常称她为“孙中山夫人”宋庆龄(人們常稱她為「孫中山夫人」宋慶齡)。
examples.pinyin: Rénmen cháng chēng tā wéi “Sūn Zhōngshān fūrén” Sòng Qìnglíng.
examples.english: People often call her “Madame Sun Yat-sen,” Song Qingling.

examples.chinese: 许多学校和基金会以宋庆龄命名(許多學校和基金會以宋慶齡命名)。
examples.pinyin: Xǔduō xuéxiào hé jījīnhuì yǐ Sòng Qìnglíng mìngmíng.
examples.english: Many schools and foundations are named after Song Qingling.
